thread.title: 'F--- you for that': Milo Yiannopoulos attacks the media in a press conference after resigning from Breitbart
thread.title_full: 'F--- you for that': Milo Yiannopoulos attacks the media in a press conference after resigning from Breitbart

author: Emmanuel Ocbazghi
title: 'F--- you for that': Milo Yiannopoulos attacks the media in a press conference after resigning from Breitbart
text:
embed 
Just weeks after protests broke out at UC Berkeley, Milo Yiannopoulos is under fire for appearing to condone pedophilia. The controversial speaker and columnist announced his resignation from Breitbart in a press conference and partially blamed the media for his negative image. 
Follow BI Video: On Twitter Most Popular
